name: Desinfo
description:
Play as the guy in charge of disinformation campaigns! Choose which audiences to target with your disinformations and erode the trust of the public in serious media!

TTTeam

Credits:
Pavel Halbich - programming, sound
Matouš Kozma - programming, loosing The Game

Lucie Kubalová - graphics, support

We used sound assets from https://freesound.org/
